welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Norridge, the charming city that boasts a rich history and endless attractions. We hope you enjoy exploring our unique blend of small-town charm and big city amenities. Have a wonderful stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights operated by United Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights operated by Delta Air Lines, Delta Connection, and Air Canada.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights operated by American Airlines, American Eagle, and Iberia.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: This terminal serves international flights operated by various airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pal-Waukee Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Pal-Waukee Airport is used for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Midway Airport houses most of the airport's services and amenities, including check-in counters, security checkpoints, and a variety of dining and shopping options.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A is home to gates A1-A10 and primarily serves Southwest Airlines flights.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B is home to gates B1-B22 and serves a variety of airlines, including Delta, Porter, and Volaris.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. Simply select the network and follow the instructions to connect.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Dupage County Airport houses all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Dupage County Airport is reserved for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect for free for up to 2 hours.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lewis Lockport Airport houses all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Lewis Lockport Airport is responsible for handling all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport offers a variety of amenities and services for travelers.

terminals.name: International Terminal
terminals.description: The international terminal at Municipal Airport serves flights to and from various countries around the world.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
